cards.name: 40till5
cards.subtitle: „ÄàDesigner„Äâ
cards.flavorText: Every wave between you and I, recieved. The cosmos, interpreted by waves, through waves. If we can perceive, can we not also impact?

cards.name: Aetos
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®WARBOND‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Knight's Roost ‚ü®+2DEF‚ü©
Born of wind and cloud, I carry dreams skyward.

cards.name: Aetos
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®FAMILIAR‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Talons and Beak ‚ü®4D : 3TD‚ü©
Scout's Eye: Reveal 2 Random Cards in the opposing players deck ‚ü®3M‚ü©
'Trust him more than my own two feet' -Knight

cards.name: Aetos
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Soverign‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Atmospheric Assault ‚ü®8D : 6TD‚ü©
Steel, Blood, Feathers, Screams and Screeches.

cards.name: Ben
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®MEME KING‚ü©
cards.flavorText: Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain something, something of equal value must be lost. That is alchemy's first law of Equivalent Exchange.

cards.name: Bliddo
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Card Crafter‚ü©
cards.flavorText: Saw what you did there, glad I thought of it.

cards.name: Cag
cards.subtitle: „ÄàZEN„Äâ
cards.flavorText: Empty the mind, release the self, become one with the infinite void. In detachment from material bonds, true freedom is found.

cards.name: Rampage
cards.subtitle: „ÄàOgrid„Äâ
cards.flavorText:
Big Stick Swinging„Äà4D : 30% SE : 1TR„Äâ
(30% chance for tree to fracture causing bleed effect. 1 turn conditional recharge)

cards.name: Ent
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Woodland‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Passive: While this card is fielded, all ally cards on the field get +1 DEF every turn.
'Wood, Water, Sapling, Iceberg.'

cards.name: Moonwell Sanctuary
cards.flavorText:
Fairy Magic ‚ü®+3M‚ü©
Where moonbeams kiss the sacred waters, ancient magic flows eternal.

cards.name: Fisherman
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Monger‚ü©
cards.flavorText: Sometimes, the best catch is a moment of peace.

cards.name: Forest Spirit
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®VOID‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Void Strike ‚ü®2D : 2TD‚ü©
Spirit Rend ‚ü®Sleeping targets take 50% HP as TD‚ü©

cards.name: Getri
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Ancient‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Bite ‚ü®2D : 1TD‚ü©
Passive: Can evolve into Hydra after 3 turns on field

cards.name: Getri
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®ANCIENT‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Tri Attack ‚ü®6D : 3TD‚ü©
Passive: Upon death, spawn a Wyrm

cards.name: Stone Guardian
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®SENTINEL‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Carved from the mountain's heart, I stand eternal vigil over sacred grounds.
Passive: Take 50% Reduced TD

cards.name: HOL
cards.subtitle: „ÄàFED„Äâ
cards.flavorText: He didn't know anything, other than how to be an asshole. Broke the news to him while he was eviscerated out of this plane of existance on drugs he didn't know and doses he couldn't measure. Serves him right.

cards.name: Johnny
cards.subtitle: „ÄàGambler„Äâ
cards.flavorText: Eternal salvation was promised to this ape before he was born.

cards.name: Juror
cards.subtitle: „ÄàKLEROS„Äâ
cards.flavorText: Where consensus meets justice, in the court of cryptographic truth, every dispute finds its resolution through the ancient scales of collective reason.

cards.name: Kro
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®DEPTHS‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Tentacle Crush ‚ü®8D : 6TD‚ü©
Depths Dominion: All water creatures gain +2/+1 ‚ü®5M‚ü©

cards.name: Lich
cards.subtitle: „ÄàUNDYING„Äâ
cards.flavorText:
Raise Dead ‚ü®5M: Summon 2 Zombies‚ü©
Army of Darkness: +1„ÄàATK„Äâfor each Zombie on field

cards.name: Lillie007
cards.subtitle: „ÄàAgent„Äâ
cards.flavorText:
Would the Op let you fuck?
' Well, would she? ' -Ben

cards.name: Mr. F
cards.subtitle: „ÄàGENESIS„Äâ
cards.flavorText: From the first block forged in digital fire. Guardian of consensus, keeper of the protocol's promise, forever bound to the network's beating heart.

cards.name: Nitro Slav
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®LUXURY‚ü©
cards.flavorText: Whether it's nine ETH for a BOARD, or nine foot backs off the coast of Kona, Nitro is always the first in the water. An example for all surfers, if the water is wet, Nitro is surfing.

cards.name: Pep
cards.subtitle: „ÄàAEGIS„Äâ
cards.flavorText: In the depths of blockchain realms, where smart contracts weave destiny itself, stands the architect of digital empires. Master of the AEGIS protocol, guardian of decentralized dreams.

cards.name: Phelob
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Cave King‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Hemodrain ‚ü®4D - 50% Lifesteal‚ü©
In the deepest tunnels, where light fears to tread, ancient things still weave their schemes.

cards.name: Feelsix
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Mythical‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Scorched Earth ‚ü®4M : Deal 1TD to all enemy cards‚ü©
Passive: Attacking places this card in the graveyard for one turn, after which it's returned to the players hand.

cards.name: Proof
cards.subtitle: „ÄàSURF„Äâ
cards.flavorText: Where liquidity meets innovation, riding the waves of DeFi protocols with unmatched precision. Master of automated market makers, guardian of yield strategies, architect of the next financial tide.

cards.name: Sasquepe
cards.subtitle: „ÄàCRYPTID„Äâ
cards.flavorText:
Hammer Fist ‚ü®5D : 3TD‚ü©
Rush: This card can attack the same turn it's fielded

cards.name: Forest Shaman
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®MYSTIC‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Spirit Call ‚ü®Summon a Forest Spirit token 2/2‚ü©
Ancient Wisdom: Draw 2 cards, gain +1/+1 for each nature card ‚ü®4M‚ü©
The forest whispers secrets to those who truly listen.

cards.name: Slight of Hand
cards.flavorText:
Slight of Hand ‚ü®Draw two addition cards‚ü©
Where fortunes rise and fall with the turn of a card, luck favors the bold.

cards.name: Moonwraith
cards.subtitle: „ÄàPHANTOM„Äâ
cards.flavorText:
Phase Shift ‚ü®3M: Become untargetable for 2 turns‚ü©
Spectral Blade ‚ü®1D: 2TD‚ü©

cards.name: Tokiru
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Shell Wanderer‚ü©
cards.flavorText:
Shell Fortress ‚ü®-1 from all damage‚ü©
Through countless eruptions I have walked, my shell bearing the wisdom of ages.

cards.name: Vanpe
cards.subtitle: ‚ü®Antirush‚ü©
cards.flavorText: Passive: Attack damage agaisnt Vanpe is multiplied by 0.5 and applied as TD

cards.name: Yostari
cards.subtitle: „ÄàScribe„Äâ
cards.flavorText: Every event push catalogued, every price change recorded, every fragment of the old world's wisdom safeguarded for humanity's future.

cards.name: Zombie
cards.subtitle: „ÄàUndying„Äâ
cards.flavorText:
Bite ‚ü®1D : 1TD‚ü©
Passive: Undying - 50% chance to return to field on death
Horde Mentality: +1 ATK for each other Zombie on field
